lyrics.text:
‘Oku ‘ia Kalaisi pē
He folofola mo’ui.
Me’akai ia he Laumālie,
He folofola mo’ui.
Me’a ke maama ‘a e loto,
Fakatupu ‘a e poto;
Lea fakaof
o
!
Lea ‘oku vov
o
!
Ko e fufu’unga mo’ui!

Na’e pehe he kamata’anga
He folofola mo’ui.
Nofo po’uli ‘a Maama -
He folofola mo’ui!
Folofola ke tupu
La’ā mo e ngaahi fetu’u.
Lea fakaof
o
!
Lea ‘oku vov
o
!
Ko e fufu’unga mo’ui!

‘Ufi ‘akau ‘a e funga fonua
He folofola mo’ui.
Fonu ‘atā ‘i he manupuna
He folofola mo’ui
“Ha’u ke tau ngaohi tangata,
Faka’otua hono anga.”
Lea fakaof
o
!
Lea ‘oku vov
o
!
Ko e fufu’unga mo’ui!

Toe hoko mo Sīsū ia
He folofola mo’ui.
Tuʻu mei fa’itoka ‘a e ngaahi pekia
He folofola mo’ui.
ʻĀ ‘a e kui ‘o sio,
Poto ‘a e vale ‘o ‘ilo.
Lea fakaof
o
!
Lea ‘oku vov
o
!
Ko e fufu’unga mo’ui!

Sīsū te ne foaki pē
He folofola mo’ui
Ki he kau kole fulipē -
He folofola mo’ui.
‘Omi ta’e ha totongi,
Hotau loto ke o’i.
Lea fakaof
o
!
Lea ‘oku vov
o
!
Ko e fufu’unga mo’ui!

Kuo a’u atu he ngaahi kakai
He fofofola mo’ui.
Lau ai ki monu ha fu’u toko lahi
He folofola mo’ui.
Fai pē ‘a e fusi fonua,
Hiki kakai ki ‘olunga.
Lea fakaof
o
!
Lea ‘oku vov
o
!
Ko e fufu’unga mo’ui! *
Origins of this hymn
